NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
August 31, 1984
Mr. Morris Wattenberg
932 Rogers Place
Cincinnati, Ohio
Dear Mr. Wattenbergt
Your letter to Mr. Ausraus of August 28, 1954.
to the new NABB Placement Service.
has been referred
Under serrate cover you will receive our Placement Service ap-
plication forms. If you would care to fill these out and submit
them to our office, we would be most happy to see what kind of a
position we can secure for you.
Hoping to serve you in the near future, I remain
Very truly yours,
Don Walker (in charge)
